net.corda.core.utilities

Class EncodingUtils

  • net.corda.core.utilities.EncodingUtils

  • public class EncodingUtils

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_HASH_HEX_SIZE
      The maximum supported field-size for hash HEX-encoded outputs (e.g. database fields). This value is enough to support hash functions with outputs up to 512 bits (e.g. SHA3-512), in which case 128 HEX characters are required. 130 was selected instead of 128, to allow for 2 extra characters that will be used as hash-scheme identifiers.

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_HASH_HEX_SIZE

        public static int MAX_HASH_HEX_SIZE

        The maximum supported field-size for hash HEX-encoded outputs (e.g. database fields). This value is enough to support hash functions with outputs up to 512 bits (e.g. SHA3-512), in which case 128 HEX characters are required. 130 was selected instead of 128, to allow for 2 extra characters that will be used as hash-scheme identifiers.

      • parsePublicKeyBase58

        public static java.security.PublicKey parsePublicKeyBase58(java.lang.String base58String)

        Method to return the PublicKey object given its Base58-String representation.

        Parameters:
        base58String - the Base58 encoded format of the serialised PublicKey.
        Returns:
        the resulted PublicKey after decoding the base58String input and then deserialising to a PublicKey object.
        See Also:
        PublicKey, String
